trans-unit.source: Running gulp --tasks-simple didn't list any tasks. Did you run npm install?
trans-unit.target: 執行 Gulp --tasks-simple 未列出任何工作。是否已執行 npm 安裝?

trans-unit.source: Running jake --tasks didn't list any tasks. Did you run npm install?
trans-unit.target: 執行 Jake --tasks 未列出任何工作。是否已執行 npm 安裝?

trans-unit.source: Gulp is not installed on your system. Run npm install -g gulp to install it.
trans-unit.target: 您的系統尚未安裝 Gulp。請執行 npm install -g gulp 進行安裝。

trans-unit.source: Jake is not installed on your system. Run npm install -g jake to install it.
trans-unit.target: 您的系統尚未安裝 Jake。請執行 npm install -g jake 進行安裝。

trans-unit.source: Grunt is not installed on your system. Run npm install -g grunt to install it.
trans-unit.target: 您的系統尚未安裝 Grunt。請執行 npm install -g grunt 進行安裝。

trans-unit.source: Program {0} was not found. Message is {1}
trans-unit.target: 找不到程式 {0}。訊息為 {1}

trans-unit.source: Build task named '{0}' detected.
trans-unit.target: 偵測到名為 '{0}' 的建置工作。

trans-unit.source: Test task named '{0}' detected.
trans-unit.target: 偵測到名為 '{0}' 的測試工作。

trans-unit.source: The task system is configured for version 0.1.0 (see tasks.json file), which can only execute custom tasks. Upgrade to version 2.0.0 to run the task: {0}
trans-unit.target: 工作系統已設定為 0.1.0 版 (請參考 tasks.json 檔案)，其只能執行自訂工作。請升級至 2.0.0 以執行工作: {0}

trans-unit.source: A unknown error has occurred while executing a task. See task output log for details.
trans-unit.target: 執行工作時發生不明錯誤。如需詳細資訊，請參閱工作輸出記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Watching build tasks has finished.
trans-unit.target: 監看建置工作已完成。

trans-unit.source: Failed to launch external program {0} {1}.
trans-unit.target: 無法啟動外部程式 {0} {1}。

trans-unit.source: The task '{0}' was terminated per user request.
trans-unit.target: 根據使用者要求已終止工作 '{0}'。

trans-unit.source: Problem matcher {0} can't be resolved. The matcher will be ignored
trans-unit.target: 問題比對器 {0} 無法解析，比對器將予忽略。

trans-unit.source: Tasks
trans-unit.target: 工作

trans-unit.source: Building...
trans-unit.target: 正在建置...

trans-unit.source: Show Running Tasks
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行中的工作

trans-unit.source: Running Tasks
trans-unit.target: 正在執行工作

trans-unit.source: &&Run Task...
trans-unit.target: 執行工作(&&R)...

trans-unit.source: Run &&Build Task...
trans-unit.target: 執行建置工作(&&B)…

trans-unit.source: Show Runnin&&g Tasks...
trans-unit.target: 顯示正在執行的工作(&&G)...

trans-unit.source: R&&estart Running Task...
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動正在執行的工作(&&E)...

trans-unit.source: &&Terminate Task...
trans-unit.target: 終止工作(&&T)...

trans-unit.source: &&Configure Tasks...
trans-unit.target: 設定工作(&&C)...

trans-unit.source: Configure De&&fault Build Task...
trans-unit.target: 設定預設建置工作(&&F)...

trans-unit.source: Open Workspace Tasks
trans-unit.target: 開啟工作區工作

trans-unit.source: Show Task Log
trans-unit.target: 顯示工作記錄檔

trans-unit.source: Run Task
trans-unit.target: 執行工作

trans-unit.source: Rerun Last Task
trans-unit.target: 重新執行上次工作

trans-unit.source: Restart Running Task
trans-unit.target: 重新開始執行工作

trans-unit.source: Show Running Tasks
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行中的工作

trans-unit.source: Terminate Task
trans-unit.target: 終止工作

trans-unit.source: Run Build Task
trans-unit.target: 執行建置工作

trans-unit.source: Run Test Task
trans-unit.target: 執行測試工作

trans-unit.source: Configure Default Build Task
trans-unit.target: 設定預設組建工作

trans-unit.source: Configure Default Test Task
trans-unit.target: 設定預設測試工作

trans-unit.source: Open User Tasks
trans-unit.target: 開啟使用者工作

trans-unit.source: Type the name of a task to run.
trans-unit.target: 鍵入要執行的工作名稱。

trans-unit.source: Run Task
trans-unit.target: 執行工作

trans-unit.source: Tasks
trans-unit.target: 工作

trans-unit.source: Configures whether to show the problem matcher prompt when running a task. Set to `true` to never prompt, or use a dictionary of task types to turn off prompting only for specific task types.
trans-unit.target: 設定執行工作時是否要顯示問題比對器提示。設定為 `true` 會永不提示，或是使用工作類型的字典來僅針對特定工作類型關閉提示。

trans-unit.source: Sets problem matcher prompting behavior for all tasks.
trans-unit.target: 為所有工作設定問題比對器提示行為。

trans-unit.source: An object containing task type-boolean pairs to never prompt for problem matchers on.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作類型-布林值配對的物件，永不提示啟用問題比對器。

trans-unit.source: Controls enablement of `provideTasks` for all task provider extension. If the Tasks: Run Task command is slow, disabling auto detect for task providers may help. Individual extensions may also provide settings that disable auto detection.
trans-unit.target: 控制所有工作提供者擴充的 `provideTasks` 啟用。如果 Tasks: Run Task 命令太慢，停用工作提供者的自動偵測可能有所幫助。個別擴充可能會提供停用自動偵測的設定。

trans-unit.source: Configures whether a warning is shown when a provider is slow
trans-unit.target: 設定是否在提供者很慢時顯示警告

trans-unit.source: Sets the slow provider warning for all tasks.
trans-unit.target: 為所有工作設定慢速提供者警告。

trans-unit.source: An array of task types to never show the slow provider warning.
trans-unit.target: 永不顯示慢速提供者警告的工作類型陣列。

trans-unit.source: Controls the number of recent items tracked in task quick open dialog.
trans-unit.target: 控制工作快速開啟對話方塊中所追蹤最近使用的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show the task detail for task that have a detail in the Run Task quick pick.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示在 [執行工作] 快選中具有詳細資料之工作的工作詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the task quick pick is skipped when there is only one task to pick from.
trans-unit.target: 控制當只有一個工作可供選取時是否跳過工作快選。

trans-unit.source: Error: the task identifier '{0}' is missing the required property '{1}'. The task identifier will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 工作識別碼 '{0}' 缺少必要屬性 '{1}'。將忽略工作識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Task version 0.1.0 is deprecated. Please use 2.0.0
trans-unit.target: 工作版本 0.1.0 已取代。請使用 2.0.0

trans-unit.source: The config's version number
trans-unit.target: 組態的版本號碼

trans-unit.source: The runner has graduated. Use the offical runner property
trans-unit.target: 執行器已結束支援.請參考官方執行器屬性

trans-unit.source: Defines whether the task is executed as a process and the output is shown in the output window or inside the terminal.
trans-unit.target: 定義工作是否作為處理程序執行，以及輸出會顯示在輸出視窗或終端機內。

trans-unit.source: Windows specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Windows 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Mac specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Mac 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Linux specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Linux 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the command is a shell command or an external program. Defaults to false if omitted.
trans-unit.target: 指定此命令是殼層命令或外部程式。如果省略，預設為 False。

trans-unit.source: Select the task to run
trans-unit.target: 請選取要執行的工作

trans-unit.source: The actual task type. Please note that types starting with a '$' are reserved for internal usage.
trans-unit.target: 實際工作類型。請注意以 '$' 作為開頭的類型皆為內部使用保留。

trans-unit.source: Additional properties of the task type
trans-unit.target: 工作類型的其他屬性

trans-unit.source: The task type configuration is missing the required 'taskType' property
trans-unit.target: 工作類型組態遺失需要的 'taskType' 屬性

trans-unit.source: Contributes task kinds
trans-unit.target: 提供工作種類

trans-unit.source: This folder has tasks ({0}) defined in 'tasks.json' that run automatically when you open this folder. Do you allow automatic tasks to run when you open this folder?
trans-unit.target: 在此資料夾內，工作 ({0}) 定義在 'tasks.json' 中，並會在您開啟此資料夾時自動執行。要允許自動工作在您開啟此資料夾時執行嗎?

trans-unit.source: Allow and run
trans-unit.target: 允許並執行

trans-unit.source: Disallow
trans-unit.target: 不允許

trans-unit.source: Open tasks.json
trans-unit.target: 開啟 tasks.json

trans-unit.source: Manage Automatic Tasks in Folder
trans-unit.target: 管理資料夾中的自動工作

trans-unit.source: Allow Automatic Tasks in Folder
trans-unit.target: 允許資料中的自動工作

trans-unit.source: Disallow Automatic Tasks in Folder
trans-unit.target: 不允許資料夾中的自動工作

trans-unit.source: Warning: options.cwd must be of type string. Ignoring value {0}
trans-unit.target: 警告: options.cwd 必須屬於字串類型。即將忽略值 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Error: command argument must either be a string or a quoted string. Provided value is: {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 命令參數必須是字串或帶引號的字串。提供的值為: {0}

trans-unit.source: Warning: shell configuration is only supported when executing tasks in the terminal.
trans-unit.target: 警告: 只有在終端機中執行工作時才支援殼層組態。

trans-unit.source: Error: Problem Matcher in declare scope must have a name: {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 宣告範圍中的問題比對器必須有名稱: {0}

trans-unit.source: Warning: the defined problem matcher is unknown. Supported types are string | ProblemMatcher | Array<string | ProblemMatcher>. {0}
trans-unit.target: 警告: 定義的問題比對器未知。支援的類型為 string | ProblemMatcher | Array<string | ProblemMatcher>。{0}

trans-unit.source: Error: Invalid problemMatcher reference: {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: problemMatcher 參考無效: {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: tasks configuration must have a type property. The configuration will be ignored. {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 工作組態必須具有型別屬性。將會忽略該組態。 {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: there is no registered task type '{0}'. Did you miss to install an extension that provides a corresponding task provider?
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 沒有已註冊工作類型 '{0}'。您是否忘記安裝提供相應工作提供者的延伸模組?

trans-unit.source: Error: the task configuration '{0}' is missing the required property 'type'. The task configuration will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 工作組態 '{0}' 缺少必要屬性 'type'。將忽略工作組態。

trans-unit.source: Error: the task configuration '{0}' is using an unknown type. The task configuration will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 工作組態 '{0}' 目前使用未知的類型。將忽略工作組態。

trans-unit.source: Error: tasks is not declared as a custom task. The configuration will be ignored. {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 未將工作宣告為自訂工作。將會忽略該組態。 {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: a task must provide a label property. The task will be ignored. {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 一項工作必須提供標籤屬性。即將忽略此工作。 {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: the task '{0}' neither specifies a command nor a dependsOn property. The task will be ignored. Its definition is: {1}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 工作 '{0}' 未指定命令與 dependsOn 屬性。將會略過該工作。其定義為: {1}

trans-unit.source: Error: the task '{0}' doesn't define a command. The task will be ignored. Its definition is: {1}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 工作 '{0}' 未定義命令。即將略過該工作。其定義為: {1}

trans-unit.source: Task version 2.0.0 doesn't support global OS specific tasks. Convert them to a task with a OS specific command. Affected tasks are: {0}
trans-unit.target: 工作版本 2.0.0 不支援全域 OS 特定工作。請使用 OS 特定命令來轉換這些工作。受影響的工作為: {0}

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the command is a shell command or an external program. Defaults to false if omitted.
trans-unit.target: 指定此命令是殼層命令或外部程式。如果省略，預設為 False。

trans-unit.source: The property isShellCommand is deprecated. Use the type property of the task and the shell property in the options instead. See also the 1.14 release notes.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰屬性 isShellCommand。請改為在 [選項] 中使用型別屬性及殼層屬性。此外也請參閱 1.14 版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The task identifier.
trans-unit.target: 工作識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Another task this task depends on.
trans-unit.target: 此工作相依的另一個工作。

trans-unit.source: The other tasks this task depends on.
trans-unit.target: 此工作相依的其他工作。

trans-unit.source: Either a string representing another task or an array of other tasks that this task depends on.
trans-unit.target: 代表另一個工作的字串或此工作相依的其他工作陣列。

trans-unit.source: Run all dependsOn tasks in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 並行執行所有 dependsOn 工作。

trans-unit.source: Run all dependsOn tasks in sequence.
trans-unit.target: 按順序執行所有 dependsOn 工作。

trans-unit.source: Determines the order of the dependsOn tasks for this task. Note that this property is not recursive.
trans-unit.target: 決定此工作的 dependsOn 工作順序。請注意，這個屬性不會遞迴。

trans-unit.source: An optional description of a task that shows in the Run Task quick pick as a detail.
trans-unit.target: 工作的選擇性描述，在 [執行工作] 快選中顯示為詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Configures the panel that is used to present the task's output and reads its input.
trans-unit.target: 設定要用來顯示工作輸出和讀取工作輸入的面板。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the executed command is echoed to the panel. Default is true.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否會將執行的命令回應給面板。預設為 true。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the panel takes focus. Default is false. If set to true the panel is revealed as well.
trans-unit.target: 控制面板是否要接受焦點。預設為 true。若設定為 true，也會使顯示面板。

trans-unit.source: Always reveals the problems panel when this task is executed.
trans-unit.target: 在執行此工作時，永遠顯示問題面板。

trans-unit.source: Only reveals the problems panel if a problem is found.
trans-unit.target: 只在發現問題時才顯示問題面板。

trans-unit.source: Never reveals the problems panel when this task is executed.
trans-unit.target: 執行此任務時，永不顯示問題面板。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the problems panel is revealed when running this task or not. Takes precedence over option "reveal". Default is "never".
trans-unit.target: 控制執行此工作時是否顯示問題面板。優先於選項 "reveal"。預設為 "never"。

trans-unit.source: Always reveals the terminal when this task is executed.
trans-unit.target: 執行此工作時，一律顯示終端機。

trans-unit.source: Only reveals the terminal if the task exits with an error or the problem matcher finds an error.
trans-unit.target: 只有在工作結束發生錯誤或問題比對器發現問題時才顯示終端機。

trans-unit.source: Never reveals the terminal when this task is executed.
trans-unit.target: 執行此工作時，永不顯示終端機。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the terminal running the task is revealed or not. May be overridden by option "revealProblems". Default is "always".
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示執行工作的終端機。可透過選項 "revealProblems” 予以覆寫。預設為 "always"。

trans-unit.source: Controls if the panel is shared between tasks, dedicated to this task or a new one is created on every run.
trans-unit.target: 控制面板是否會在工作之間共用、專屬於此工作或是在每個回合建立一個新的面板。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show the `Terminal will be reused by tasks, press any key to close it` message.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示「工作將重新使用終端機，請按任意鍵將其關閉」訊息。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the terminal is cleared before executing the task.
trans-unit.target: 控制在執行工作前是否清除終端機。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the task is executed in a specific terminal group using split panes.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否使用分割窗格在特定的終端機群組中執行工作。

trans-unit.source: The terminal property is deprecated. Use presentation instead
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰終端機屬性。請改用簡報

trans-unit.source: The task's execution group.
trans-unit.target: 該工作的執行群組。

trans-unit.source: Defines if this task is the default task in the group.
trans-unit.target: 定義此工作在群組中是否為預設工作。

trans-unit.source: Marks the task as the default build task.
trans-unit.target: 將工作標記為預設組建工作。

trans-unit.source: Marks the task as the default test task.
trans-unit.target: 將工作標記為預設測試工作。

trans-unit.source: Marks the task as a build task accessible through the 'Run Build Task' command.
trans-unit.target: 將工作標記為可透過 'Run Build Task' 命令存取的組建工作。

trans-unit.source: Marks the task as a test task accessible through the 'Run Test Task' command.
trans-unit.target: 將工作標記為可透過 'Run Test Task' 命令存取的測試工作。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the task to no group
trans-unit.target: 指派工作到沒有群組

trans-unit.source: Defines to which execution group this task belongs to. It supports "build" to add it to the build group and "test" to add it to the test group.
trans-unit.target: 定義工作屬於哪個執行群組。支援將 「組建」新增到組建群組，以及將「測試」新增到測試群組。

trans-unit.source: Defines whether the task is run as a process or as a command inside a shell.
trans-unit.target: 定義工作在殼層中會作為處理程序或命令來執行。

trans-unit.source: The shell command to be executed. Array items will be joined using a space character
trans-unit.target: 要執行的 shell 命令。陣列項目會以空白字元連接

trans-unit.source: The actual command value
trans-unit.target: 實際命令值

trans-unit.source: Escapes characters using the shell's escape character (e.g. ` under PowerShell and \ under bash).
trans-unit.target: 使用殼層逸出字元的逸出字元 (例如 ` under PowerShell 與 \ under bash)。

trans-unit.source: Quotes the argument using the shell's strong quote character (e.g. " under PowerShell and bash).
trans-unit.target: 使用殼層的強式引號字元將引數括住 (例如 PowerShell 及 Bash 下的 ")。

trans-unit.source: Quotes the argument using the shell's weak quote character (e.g. ' under PowerShell and bash).
trans-unit.target: 使用殼層的弱式引號字元將引數括住 (例如 PowerShell 及 Bash 下的 ')

trans-unit.source: How the command value should be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 應如何引用命令值。

trans-unit.source: The command to be executed. Can be an external program or a shell command.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的命令。可以是外部程式或殼層命令。

trans-unit.source: The actual argument value
trans-unit.target: 實際引數值

trans-unit.source: How the argument value should be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 如何引用參數值。

trans-unit.source: Arguments passed to the command when this task is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 叫用此工作時，傳遞至命令的引數。

trans-unit.source: The task's user interface label
trans-unit.target: 工作的使用者介面標籤

trans-unit.source: The config's version number.
trans-unit.target: 組態版本號碼

trans-unit.source: A user defined identifier to reference the task in launch.json or a dependsOn clause.
trans-unit.target: 用以參考在 launch.json 或 dependsOn 子句中工作的使用者定義識別碼。

trans-unit.source: User defined identifiers are deprecated. For custom task use the name as a reference and for tasks provided by extensions use their defined task identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的身分識別已淘汰。請為自訂工作使用名稱作為參考，並為延伸模組提供的工作使用其已定義的工作身分識別。

trans-unit.source: Whether to reevaluate task variables on rerun.
trans-unit.target: 是否要在重新執行時重新評估工作變數。

trans-unit.source: Configures when the task should be run. If set to folderOpen, then the task will be run automatically when the folder is opened.
trans-unit.target: 設定工作應何時執行。若設定為 folderOpen，則會在開啟資料夾時，自動執行工作。

trans-unit.source: The number of instances of the task that are allowed to run simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 允許同時執行的工作執行個體數。

trans-unit.source: The task's run related options
trans-unit.target: 工作的執行相關選項

trans-unit.source: The task's label
trans-unit.target: 工作的標籤

trans-unit.source: The task's name
trans-unit.target: 工作的名稱

trans-unit.source: The task's name property is deprecated. Use the label property instead.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰工作的名稱屬性。請改用標籤屬性。

trans-unit.source: Whether the executed task is kept alive and is running in the background.
trans-unit.target: 執行的工作是否保持運作且正在背景執行。

trans-unit.source: Whether the user is prompted when VS Code closes with a running task.
trans-unit.target: 是否在 VS Code 有執行中工作的狀態下關閉時提示使用者。

trans-unit.source: The problem matcher(s) to use. Can either be a string or a problem matcher definition or an array of strings and problem matchers.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的問題比對器。可以是字串或問題比對器定義，或是字串和問題比對器陣列。

trans-unit.source: The task type to customize
trans-unit.target: 要自訂的工作類型

trans-unit.source: The customize property is deprecated. See the 1.14 release notes on how to migrate to the new task customization approach
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰自訂屬性。請參閱 1.14 版本資訊，以了解如何遷移到新的工作自訂方法

trans-unit.source: The property showOutput is deprecated. Use the reveal property inside the presentation property instead. See also the 1.14 release notes.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰屬性 showOutput。請改用簡報屬性中的顯示屬性。此外也請參閱 1.14 版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The property echoCommand is deprecated. Use the echo property inside the presentation property instead. See also the 1.14 release notes.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰屬性 echoCommand。請改用簡報屬性中的回應屬性。此外也請參閱 1.14 版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The property suppressTaskName is deprecated. Inline the command with its arguments into the task instead. See also the 1.14 release notes.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 suppressTaskName 已淘汰。請改為將命令與其引數內嵌至工作。另請參閱 1.14 版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The property isBuildCommand is deprecated. Use the group property instead. See also the 1.14 release notes.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰屬性 isBuildCommand。請改用群組屬性。此外也請參閱 1.14 版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The property isTestCommand is deprecated. Use the group property instead. See also the 1.14 release notes.
trans-unit.target: 已淘汰屬性 isTestCommand。請改用群組屬性。此外也請參閱 1.14 版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The property taskSelector is deprecated. Inline the command with its arguments into the task instead. See also the 1.14 release notes.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 taskSelector 已淘汰。請改為將命令與其引數內嵌至工作。另請參閱 1.14 版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: Windows specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Windows 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Mac specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Mac 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Linux specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Linux 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Additional command options
trans-unit.target: 其他命令選項

trans-unit.source: The current working directory of the executed program or script. If omitted Code's current workspace root is used.
trans-unit.target: 所執行程式或指令碼的目前工作目錄。如果省略，則會使用 Code 的目前工作區根目錄。

trans-unit.source: The environment of the executed program or shell. If omitted the parent process' environment is used.
trans-unit.target: 所執行程式或殼層的環境。如果省略，則會使用父處理程序的環境。

trans-unit.source: Configures the shell to be used.
trans-unit.target: 設定要使用的殼層。

trans-unit.source: The shell to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的殼層。

trans-unit.source: The shell arguments.
trans-unit.target: 殼層引數。

trans-unit.source: The command to be executed. Can be an external program or a shell command.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的命令。可以是外部程式或殼層命令。

trans-unit.source: Arguments passed to the command when this task is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 叫用此工作時，傳遞至命令的引數。

trans-unit.source: The task's name
trans-unit.target: 工作的名稱

trans-unit.source: Windows specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Windows 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: The problem matcher(s) to use. Can either be a string or a problem matcher definition or an array of strings and problem matchers.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的問題比對器。可以是字串或問題比對器定義，或是字串和問題比對器陣列。

trans-unit.source: Mac specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Mac 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Linux specific command configuration
trans-unit.target: Linux 特定命令組態

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the task name is added as an argument to the command. If omitted the globally defined value is used.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否將工作名稱當做引數加入命令中。如果省略，則會使用全域定義的值。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the output of the running task is shown or not. If omitted the globally defined value is used.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示執行中工作的輸出。如果省略，則會使用全域定義的值。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the executed command is echoed to the output. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否將執行的命令傳到輸出。預設為 False。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated. Use isBackground instead.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代。請改用 isBackground。

trans-unit.source: Whether the executed task is kept alive and is watching the file system.
trans-unit.target: 執行的工作是否保持運作且正在監看檔案系統。

trans-unit.source: Whether the executed task is kept alive and is running in the background.
trans-unit.target: 執行的工作是否保持運作且正在背景執行。

trans-unit.source: Whether the user is prompted when VS Code closes with a running task.
trans-unit.target: 是否在 VS Code 有執行中工作的狀態下關閉時提示使用者。

trans-unit.source: Maps this task to Code's default build command.
trans-unit.target: 將此工作對應至 Code 的預設建置命令。

trans-unit.source: Maps this task to Code's default test command.
trans-unit.target: 將此工作對應至 Code 的預設測試命令。

trans-unit.source: Additional arguments passed to the command.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至命令的其他引數。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the output of the running task is shown or not. If omitted 'always' is used.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否顯示執行中工作的輸出。如果省略，則會使用 [永遠]。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated. Use isBackground instead.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代。請改用 isBackground。

trans-unit.source: Whether the executed task is kept alive and is watching the file system.
trans-unit.target: 執行的工作是否保持運作且正在監看檔案系統。

trans-unit.source: Whether the executed task is kept alive and is running in the background.
trans-unit.target: 執行的工作是否保持運作且正在背景執行。

trans-unit.source: Whether the user is prompted when VS Code closes with a running background task.
trans-unit.target: 是否在 VSCode 以執行中的背景工作關閉時提示使用者。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the task name is added as an argument to the command. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否將工作名稱當做引數加入命令中。預設為 False。

trans-unit.source: Prefix to indicate that an argument is task.
trans-unit.target: 前置詞，表示引數是工作。

trans-unit.source: The problem matcher(s) to use. Can either be a string or a problem matcher definition or an array of strings and problem matchers.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的問題比對器。可以是字串或問題比對器定義，或是字串和問題比對器陣列。

trans-unit.source: The task configurations. Usually these are enrichments of task already defined in the external task runner.
trans-unit.target: 工作組態。這些通常是在外部工作執行器中已定義的工作擴充。

trans-unit.source: Show All Tasks...
trans-unit.target: 顯示所有工作...

trans-unit.source: Configure Task
trans-unit.target: 設定工作

trans-unit.source: contributed
trans-unit.target: 已提供

trans-unit.source: recently used
trans-unit.target: 最近使用的

trans-unit.source: configured
trans-unit.target: 已設定

trans-unit.source: Go back ↩
trans-unit.target: 返回 ↩

trans-unit.source: No {0} tasks found. Go back ↩
trans-unit.target: 找不到任何 {0} 工作。請返回 ↩

trans-unit.source: The problem pattern is missing a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 此問題模式缺少規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The loop property is only supported on the last line matcher.
trans-unit.target: 只有最後一行比對器才支援迴圈屬性。

trans-unit.source: The problem pattern is invalid. The kind property must be provided only in the first element
trans-unit.target: 問題模式無效。 這類屬性只能在第一個元素中提供

trans-unit.source: The problem pattern is invalid. It must have at least have a file and a message.
trans-unit.target: 問題模式無效。其必須至少有一個檔案及訊息。

trans-unit.source: The problem pattern is invalid. It must either have kind: "file" or have a line or location match group.
trans-unit.target: 問題模式無效。其必須有任一類型: "檔案" 或者是有行或位置符合群組。

trans-unit.source: Error: The string {0} is not a valid regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 字串 {0} 不是有效的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression to find an error, warning or info in the output.
trans-unit.target: 規則運算式，用來在輸出中尋找錯誤、警告或資訊。

trans-unit.source: whether the pattern matches a location (file and line) or only a file.
trans-unit.target: 該模式是否符合位置 (檔案和行) 或僅符合檔案。

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the filename. If omitted 1 is used.
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱的符合群組索引。如果省略，則會使用 1。

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the problem's location. Valid location patterns are: (line), (line,column) and (startLine,startColumn,endLine,endColumn). If omitted (line,column) is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 問題之位置的符合群組索引。有效的位置模式為: (line)、(line,column) 和 (startLine,startColumn,endLine,endColumn)。如果省略，則會假設 (line,column)。

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the problem's line. Defaults to 2
trans-unit.target: 問題之行的符合群組索引。預設為 2

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the problem's line character. Defaults to 3
trans-unit.target: 問題行中字元的符合群組索引。預設為 3

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the problem's end line. Defaults to undefined
trans-unit.target: 問題之結尾行的符合群組索引。預設為未定義

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the problem's end line character. Defaults to undefined
trans-unit.target: 問題之結尾行字元的符合群組索引。預設為未定義

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the problem's severity. Defaults to undefined
trans-unit.target: 問題之嚴重性的符合群組索引。預設為未定義

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the problem's code. Defaults to undefined
trans-unit.target: 問題之代碼的符合群組索引。預設為未定義

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the message. If omitted it defaults to 4 if location is specified. Otherwise it defaults to 5.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的符合群組索引。如果省略並指定位置，預設為 4。否則預設為 5。

trans-unit.source: In a multi line matcher loop indicated whether this pattern is executed in a loop as long as it matches. Can only specified on a last pattern in a multi line pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在多行比對器迴圈中，指出此模式是否只要相符就會以迴圈執行。只能在多行模式中的最後一個模式指定。

trans-unit.source: The name of the problem pattern.
trans-unit.target: 問題模式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the problem multi line problem pattern.
trans-unit.target: 多行問題模式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The actual patterns.
trans-unit.target: 實際的模式。

trans-unit.source: Contributes problem patterns
trans-unit.target: 提供問題模式

trans-unit.source: Invalid problem pattern. The pattern will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 問題模式無效。此模式將予忽略。

trans-unit.source: Error: the description can't be converted into a problem matcher: {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 無法將描述轉換成問題比對器: {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: the description doesn't define a valid problem pattern: {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 描述未定義有效的問題樣式: {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: the description doesn't define an owner: {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 描述未定義擁有者: {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: the description doesn't define a file location: {0}
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 描述未定義檔案位置: {0}

trans-unit.source: Info: unknown severity {0}. Valid values are error, warning and info.
trans-unit.target: 資訊: 嚴重性 {0} 不明。有效值為錯誤、警告和資訊。

trans-unit.source: Error: the pattern with the identifier {0} doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 沒有識別碼為 {0} 的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Error: the pattern property refers to an empty identifier.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 樣式屬性參考了空的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Error: the pattern property {0} is not a valid pattern variable name.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 樣式屬性 {0} 不是有效的樣式變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: A problem matcher must define both a begin pattern and an end pattern for watching.
trans-unit.target: 問題比對器必須同時定義監控的開始模式和結束模式。

trans-unit.source: Error: The string {0} is not a valid regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 字串 {0} 不是有效的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression to detect the begin or end of a background task.
trans-unit.target: 用來查看偵測背景工作開始或結束的正規表達式.

trans-unit.source: The match group index of the filename. Can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱的符合群組索引。可以省略。

trans-unit.source: The name of a contributed or predefined pattern
trans-unit.target: 所提供或預先定義之模式的名稱

trans-unit.source: A problem pattern or the name of a contributed or predefined problem pattern. Can be omitted if base is specified.
trans-unit.target: 問題模式或所提供或預先定義之問題模式的名稱。如有指定基底，即可發出。

trans-unit.source: The name of a base problem matcher to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用之基底問題比對器的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The owner of the problem inside Code. Can be omitted if base is specified. Defaults to 'external' if omitted and base is not specified.
trans-unit.target: Code 內的問題擁有者。如果指定基底，則可以省略。如果省略且未指定基底，預設為 [外部]。

trans-unit.source: A human-readable string describing the source of this diagnostic, e.g. 'typescript' or 'super lint'.
trans-unit.target: 可供人們閱讀的診斷描述來源，例如 'typescript' 或 'super lint'。

trans-unit.source: The default severity for captures problems. Is used if the pattern doesn't define a match group for severity.
trans-unit.target: 擷取項目問題的預設嚴重性。如果模式未定義嚴重性的符合群組，就會加以使用。

trans-unit.source: Controls if a problem reported on a text document is applied only to open, closed or all documents.
trans-unit.target: 控制文字文件上所回報的問題僅會套用至開啟的文件、關閉的文件或所有文件。

trans-unit.source: Defines how file names reported in a problem pattern should be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 定義問題模式中所回報檔案名稱的解譯方式。

trans-unit.source: Patterns to track the begin and end of a matcher active on a background task.
trans-unit.target: 偵測後台任務中匹配程序模式的開始與結束.

trans-unit.source: If set to true the background monitor is in active mode when the task starts. This is equals of issuing a line that matches the beginsPattern
trans-unit.target: 若設為 true，則背景監視器會在工作開始時處於主動模式。這相當於發出與 beginsPattern 相符的行

trans-unit.source: If matched in the output the start of a background task is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 如果於輸出中相符，則會指示背景程式開始。

trans-unit.source: If matched in the output the end of a background task is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 如果於輸出中相符，則會指示背景程式結束。

trans-unit.source: The watching property is deprecated. Use background instead.
trans-unit.target: 關注屬性已被淘汰，請改用背景取代。

trans-unit.source: Patterns to track the begin and end of a watching matcher.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤匹配程序的開始與結束。

trans-unit.source: If set to true the watcher is in active mode when the task starts. This is equals of issuing a line that matches the beginPattern
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為 True，監控程式在工作啟動時處於主動模式。這相當於發出符合 beginPattern 的行

trans-unit.source: If matched in the output the start of a watching task is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 如果在輸出中相符，則會指示監看工作開始。

trans-unit.source: If matched in the output the end of a watching task is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 如果在輸出中相符，則會指示監看工作結束。

trans-unit.source: This property is deprecated. Use the watching property instead.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性即將淘汰。請改用關注的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression signaling that a watched tasks begins executing triggered through file watching.
trans-unit.target: 規則運算式，指示監看的工作開始執行 (透過檔案監看觸發)。

trans-unit.source: This property is deprecated. Use the watching property instead.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性即將淘汰。請改用關注的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression signaling that a watched tasks ends executing.
trans-unit.target: 規則運算式，指示監看的工作結束執行。

trans-unit.source: The name of the problem matcher used to refer to it.
trans-unit.target: 用來參考其問題比對器的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A human readable label of the problem matcher.
trans-unit.target: 易讀的問題比對器標籤。

trans-unit.source: Contributes problem matchers
trans-unit.target: 提供問題比對器

trans-unit.source: Microsoft compiler problems
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 編譯器問題

trans-unit.source: Less problems
trans-unit.target: 較少的問題

trans-unit.source: Gulp TSC Problems
trans-unit.target: Gulp TSC 問題

trans-unit.source: JSHint problems
trans-unit.target: JSHint 問題

trans-unit.source: JSHint stylish problems
trans-unit.target: JSHint 樣式問題

trans-unit.source: ESLint compact problems
trans-unit.target: ESLint 壓縮問題

trans-unit.source: ESLint stylish problems
trans-unit.target: ESLint 樣式問題

trans-unit.source: Go problems
trans-unit.target: 前往問題

trans-unit.source: Configure Task
trans-unit.target: 設定工作

trans-unit.source: Tasks
trans-unit.target: 工作

trans-unit.source: Changing the task execution engine with an active task running requires to reload the Window
trans-unit.target: 必須重新載入視窗才可變更執行使用中工作的工作執行引擎

trans-unit.source: Reload Window
trans-unit.target: 重新載入視窗

trans-unit.source: Select the build task (there is no default build task defined)
trans-unit.target: 選取建置工作 (未定義預設建置工作)

trans-unit.source: There are task errors. See the output for details.
trans-unit.target: 具有工作錯誤。如需詳細資料，請參閱輸出。

trans-unit.source: Show output
trans-unit.target: 顯示輸出

trans-unit.source: The folder {0} is ignored since it uses task version 0.1.0
trans-unit.target: 因為資料夾 {0} 使用工作版本 0.1.0，所以已將其忽略

trans-unit.source: No build task defined. Mark a task with 'isBuildCommand' in the tasks.json file.
trans-unit.target: 未定義任何建置工作。請使用 'isBuildCommand' 標記 tasks.json 檔案中的工作。

trans-unit.source: No build task defined. Mark a task with as a 'build' group in the tasks.json file.
trans-unit.target: 未定義任何組建工作，請在 tasks.json 檔案中將工作標記為 'build' 群組。

trans-unit.source: No test task defined. Mark a task with 'isTestCommand' in the tasks.json file.
trans-unit.target: 未定義任何建置工作。請使用 'isTestCommand' 標記 tasks.json 檔案中的工作。

trans-unit.source: No test task defined. Mark a task with as a 'test' group in the tasks.json file.
trans-unit.target: 未定義任何測試工作，請在 tasks.json 檔案中將工作標記為 'test' 群組。

trans-unit.source: Task to execute is undefined
trans-unit.target: 未定義要執行的工作

trans-unit.source: associate
trans-unit.target: 關聯

trans-unit.source: Continue without scanning the task output
trans-unit.target: 在不掃描工作輸出的情況下繼續

trans-unit.source: Never scan the task output for this task
trans-unit.target: 永不掃描此工作的工作輸出

trans-unit.source: Never scan the task output for {0} tasks
trans-unit.target: 永不掃描 {0} 工作的工作輸出

trans-unit.source: Learn more about scanning the task output
trans-unit.target: 深入了解掃描工作輸出

trans-unit.source: Select for which kind of errors and warnings to scan the task output
trans-unit.target: 選取錯誤和警告的種類以掃描工作輸出

trans-unit.source: The current task configuration has errors. Please fix the errors first before customizing a task.
trans-unit.target: 當前的工作組態存在錯誤.請更正錯誤再執行工作.

trans-unit.source: // See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=733558 // for the documentation about the tasks.json format
trans-unit.target: // 如需 tasks.json 格式的文件， // 請參閱 https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=733558

trans-unit.source: There are many build tasks defined in the tasks.json. Executing the first one.
trans-unit.target: 定義了很多建置工作於tasks.json.執行第一個.

trans-unit.source: The task '{0}' is already active.
trans-unit.target: 工作 '{0}' 已在使用中。

trans-unit.source: Terminate Task
trans-unit.target: 終止工作

trans-unit.source: Restart Task
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動工作

trans-unit.source: There is already a task running. Terminate it first before executing another task.
trans-unit.target: 已有工作在執行。請先終止該工作，然後再執行其他工作。

trans-unit.source: Failed to terminate and restart task {0}
trans-unit.target: 無法終止再重新啟動工作 {0}

trans-unit.source: Error: the provided task configuration has validation errors and can't not be used. Please correct the errors first.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: 提供的工作組態具有驗證錯誤而無法使用。請先更正這些錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Error: The content of the tasks json in {0} has syntax errors. Please correct them before executing a task.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: {0} 中的工作 json 內容有語法錯誤。請先予以更正，再執行工作。

trans-unit.source: workspace file
trans-unit.target: 工作區檔案

trans-unit.source: Only tasks version 2.0.0 permitted in .codeworkspace.
trans-unit.target: .codeworkspace 中只允許工作版本 2.0.0。

trans-unit.source: user settings
trans-unit.target: 使用者設定

trans-unit.source: Only tasks version 2.0.0 permitted in user settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用者設定中只允許工作版本 2.0.0。

trans-unit.source: Ignoring task configurations for workspace folder {0}. Multi folder workspace task support requires that all folders use task version 2.0.0
trans-unit.target: 略過工作區資料夾 {0} 的工作組態。所有的資料夾都必須使用工作版本 2.0.0 才可使用多資料夾工作區工作支援

trans-unit.source: Error: The content of the tasks.json file has syntax errors. Please correct them before executing a task.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤: tasks.json 檔案的內容具有語法錯誤。請更正錯誤，再執行工作

trans-unit.source: There is a task running. Do you want to terminate it?
trans-unit.target: 有一個工作正在執行。要終止工作嗎?

trans-unit.source: &&Terminate Task
trans-unit.target: 終止工作(&&T)

trans-unit.source: The launched task doesn't exist anymore. If the task spawned background processes exiting VS Code might result in orphaned processes. To avoid this start the last background process with a wait flag.
trans-unit.target: 啟動的工作已不存在。如果工作繁衍的背景處理程序結束，VS Code 可能會產生孤立的處理程序。若要避免此情況，請啟動有等候旗標的最後一個背景處理程序。

trans-unit.source: &&Exit Anyways
trans-unit.target: 仍要結束(&&E)

trans-unit.source: Terminate Task
trans-unit.target: 終止工作

trans-unit.source: An error has occurred while running a task. See task log for details.
trans-unit.target: 執行工作時發生錯誤。如需詳細資訊，請參閱工作記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Tasks are only available on a workspace folder.
trans-unit.target: 這些工作只會出現在工作區資料夾中。
